content.question: Which of the following is the best visual representation of the electric field vectors from both <math alttext="Q sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="Q sub 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>Q</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> at point P?

choices.label: The figure presents a diagram of electric field vectors extending from a point, with a short arrow extending horizontally to the left and a long arrow extending horizontally to the right.
The figure presents a diagram of electric field vectors extending from a point, with a short arrow and a long arrow both extending horizontally to the right.
The figure presents a diagram of electric field vectors extending from a point, with a long arrow extending horizontally to the left and a short arrow extending horizontally to the right.
The figure presents a diagram of electric field vectors extending from a point, with a long arrow and a short arrow both extending horizontally to the left.

content.answer: The figure presents a diagram of electric field vectors extending from a point, with a short arrow and a long arrow both extending horizontally to the right.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
